resources.string: "This application will collect sensor data and your public data on your social network, at times when you interact with your social networking sites. By clicking "I Agree" below, I agree to share my contextual data and I understand that my data will be used by the members of this project. "
"Please provide your email id which you use for facebook "
Please click the button below to start the SN&MB service.
Click on the button below to authenticate your FaceBook account. Only your public data will be used by this application and it will be protected by this app.
Click on the button below to authenticate your Twitter account. Only your public data will be used by this application and it will be protected this app.
